roleset.name: speak nasally

example.name: args 0 & 1
example.text: [`` Let 's not push our patience beyond the danger line , Sergeant '' ]-1, Killpath nasaled *trace*-1.
example.arg: *trace*-1: ["Let's not push our patience beyond the danger line, Sergeant"]

roleset.note: Framed by Julia based on Brown. Member of Vncls 37.3. Comparison to whisper.
